full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I BSNYEN BSGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB KYI 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B MGON PO BSNYEN CING BSGRUB PA LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB KYI 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MDZO MO MKHAR NAS NANG SO GU SHRI CHEN PO BSOD NAMS RGYAL POS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LAS, RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLA MA MGON PO DBYER MED PA'I 'PHAGS PA 'JIGS RTEN DBANG PHYUG DANG THA MI DAD PA, DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE, MKHAN PO RIN PO CHE RDO RJE 'CHANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I DPAL GYIS, SA SKYONG ZHES PA SHING MO BYA'I HOR ZLA BRGYAD PA'I YAR TSES BZANG PO LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
